result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joseph D Downing

defendant.name: Downing, Joseph D
defendant.address: 818 N Wisconsin Ave, Rice Lake, WI 54868

records.addlTxt: Bonds reinstated 11/03/22, but bond was never signed in this case.  DA's office advised.  Judge will be advised when Defendant appears at bail hearing in 21CT99 today.

11:18 AM    Defendant Joseph D Downing appeared by video, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Longacre appears for DE.  Warrants quashed in all cases.  This covers cases 22CF70, 22CM75, & 22CM108. State moves for an additional $250.00 cash in 22CF70.  Attorney Longacre requests reinstatement of bonds.  Bonds are reinstated in all cases.  All cases set to 12/2/2022 at 10:00 AM.
Status hearing scheduled for December 2, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:58 AM Defendant Joseph D Downing not in court.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow in court for Joseph D Downing.  Prosecuting attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Rockow relates. State requests bench warrants. 

22CF70 - Bench warrant - Body Only - Wisconsin and Adjacent states issued. 
22CM75, 22CM108, and 21CT99 - Bench warrant - Body Only - Statewide issued. 
22TR356 - Not defaulted - continue to track.
Plea hearing on September 9, 2022 at 10:00 am.

11:41 AM Prosecuting attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Joseph D Downing appeared by video.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow in court for Joseph D Downing. 
THIS COVERS 22CF70, 22CM75, 21CT99, and 22TR356. 

22CF70 - Formal reading waived not guilty pleas entered. 
22CM75 - Formal reading waived. Not guilty pleas entered. 

All files set for plea/status 9/9/22 at 10:00 AM in person.
Plea hearing scheduled for September 9, 2022 at 10:00 am.

8:34 AM Prosecuting attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Joseph D Downing appeared by video.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow in court for Joseph D Downing. Court reporter and witnesses appeared by video.
Covers 22CF70, 22TR356 and 21CT99
8:35 Officer Sawyer Prinsen called and sworn - Direct by State 8:38 Cross exam by Attorney Rockow 8:38 Investigator Brandon Bohl called and sworn - Direct by State 8:42 Cross exam by Attorney Rockow 8:42 Court finds probable cause and binds over. Next hearing may be by zoom unless a plea will be entered then Defendant must appear in person.  21CT99 and 22TR356 to track.
Arraignment scheduled for June 24, 2022 at 10:00 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on April 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.

10:59 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Joseph D Downing appeared by video. This covers cases 21CF70, 21CT99, & 22TR356.  Attorney Rockow relates he currently represents DE on the CT file and will most likely represent on CF case as well.  Time limits are waived. DE will have to appear in person to next hearing.  All cases track to next hearing date.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473. 
Must sign bond by 3/30/2022.

1:24 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Joseph D Downing appeared by video.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow appeared by video for Joseph D Downing. 
THIS COVERS 22TR356 and 22CF70. 
Warrant quashed. 
Must sign bond by tomorrow 3/30/22.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 30, 2022 at 10:00 am.
